persistence.

Hello I'm Arush, a Product Manager, UX Designer & Software Developer who is Detail Oriented, Tech Savvy, & Analytically Focused. Love to build products that are high-quality, cohesive, and scalable. Have the ability to figure out solutions in the midst of chaos.

Let's Talk View Resume

Blog

 

About

I am a Digital Product Manager who is Detail Oriented, Tech Savvy, & Analytically Focused. I manage tech teams and facilitate effective communication that ensures maximum visibility of the project to all stakeholders using Lean-Agile frameworks, such as Kanban and Scrum. Have the ability to figure out solutions in the midst of chaos.

I’m fascinated by what software makes possible, and what you can be capable of if you push yourself and stretch your resources.

My aim is to view the product and its features from the eyes of the user and to create an optimized experience that eases pain points and brings joy.

In free time, I love playing Snooker. Avid reading, exploring the history & culture of various places is my preferred way of learning and making sense of the world.

Availability

I am looking for full-time digital product manager roles in companies that strive to bring about lasting social and technological changes. If you have an idea for a collaboration, hit me up and we could discuss over a coffee!

Experience

Pre Sales Consultant (Summer Internship)

Researched next-gen tech. - 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗠𝗶𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴, designed an evaluation framework for benchmarking 5 largest global vendors. Also, prepared an 𝗥𝗙𝗣 for hyper-automation of an O2C process for a European manufacturing giant

This program has helped me expand my horizons through working with diverse people in a compact yet intense environment.

I received my masters in April 2020.

July 2018 - April 2020

Project Manager - Software Development

Led a cross-functional team of developers while practicing agile practices. Executed full-stack product development projects. Worked heavily on product design, user story/personas, and growth strategies.

Bank of New York Mellon

Applications Developer

After graduating, I started working full-time as a software developer building applications for US Government's asset management department. Hands-on approach to designing architecture, writing technical specifications, code + automated tests, and QA.
